extension.name: Wegent AI Assistant
extension.description: A whole dev team of AI agents in your editor.

errors.request_failed: LLM API request failed, please click retry

chat.placeholder_chat: Use the Agent team to explore and discover
chat.placeholder_code: Let the Agent development team build features, fix bugs, and explore the codebase

bot.name: Name
bot.import_mcp_desc: Please paste standardized MCP configuration JSON. The system will automatically add type: "sse" if missing or convert transport field to type field.
bot.quick_templates: Use Preset Templates for Quick Configuration
bot.template_hint: Click template button to autofill configuration, then modify the API Key
bot.please_update_api_key: Please update the API Key to your actual key

errors.required: Please fill in all required fields

errors.mcp_config_json: MCP configuration must be valid JSON
errors.dify_required_fields: Dify API Key and Base URL are required

bot.protocol_hint: Select the protocol type for the model: OpenAI or Claude (Anthropic)
bot.dify_api_key_hint: Enter your Dify application API key. Each Dify application has its own API key.
bot.dify_api_key_required: Please enter Dify API Key and Base URL first
bot.dify_base_url_hint: Dify API base URL. Use https://api.dify.ai for Dify Cloud, or your self-hosted URL.
bot.dify_mode_description: Dify bot delegates execution to external Dify API service. Enter your Dify application API key to get started.
bot.dify_parameters_hint: Configure the input parameters for this application. These values will be used when executing tasks.
bot.dify_no_parameters: No parameters configured for this application.

bots.title: AI Assistant
bots.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this bot? This action cannot be undone.
bots.force_delete_confirm_message: This bot has {{count}} running task(s). Deleting this bot may affect these tasks.
bots.force_delete_warning: Warning: Force deleting may cause running tasks to fail or become orphaned.
bots.group_required_message: You must select a target group before creating a bot in group mode

teams.title: Team List
teams.description: Agent = Bot + Collaboration Mode. Combine different bots and collaboration patterns to accomplish various tasks
teams.no_teams_description: Create your first agent to start intelligent conversations
teams.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.
teams.unbind_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to unbind this shared team? This will remove it from your team list, but the original team will not be affected.
teams.force_delete_confirm_message: This team has {{count}} running task(s). Deleting this team may affect these tasks.
teams.force_delete_warning: Warning: Force deleting may cause running tasks to fail or become orphaned.
teams.share_failed: Failed to share team, please try again
teams.group_required_message: When creating an agent in group mode, a group must be selected first
teams.share_instructions_content1: Copy and send this link to others, they can use your shared team to complete tasks directly through the link.
teams.share_instructions_content2: After sharing the team, you can still manage and edit this team, and others can apply the latest team configuration but cannot edit the team settings.

share.title: Team Share
share.confirm_message: Do you want to use {{userName}}'s {{teamName}} to execute tasks?
share.join_description: After confirmation, {{teamName}} will be added to your team list, and you can use this team to create and execute tasks.
share.self_share_message: {{teamName}} is your team, no need to join.
share.already_joined_message: {{teamName}} is already in your team list, no need to join again.
share.fetch_info_failed: Failed to fetch shared team information
share.self_share_suffix: is your team, no need to join.
share.already_joined_suffix: is already in your team list, no need to join again.
share.join_description_suffix: will be added to your team list, and you can use this team to create and execute tasks.

team.name: Name
team.prompts_tooltip: Add team-only guidance that is appended to each bot's base prompt.
team.prompts_scope_hint: Prompts added here are appended to each bot's base prompt and only affect this team.
team.prompts_scope_sub: Other teams continue to use their own configurations.
team.prompts_placeholder: Add team-level instructions that will run with this bot inside the team.
team.prompts_badge_tooltip: This bot runs with an extra team-only prompt add-on.
team.prompts_save_success: Prompts saved! They will be applied when you save the team.
team.dify_mode_pipeline_only: Dify bots only support pipeline execution mode.
team.dify_no_members_hint: Dify bots handle execution independently and do not support team members.
team.mode_change_confirm_message: Changing the collaboration mode will reset team roles and team-specific prompts. Do you want to continue?
team.bind_mode_required: Please select at least one bind mode (Chat or Code)
team.require_confirmation_tooltip: When enabled, the task will pause after this stage completes, waiting for user confirmation before proceeding to the next stage

team_model_desc.solo: A single bot handles the task independently, suitable for simple scenarios or single-responsibility workflows.
team_model_desc.pipeline: Agents are chained one after another, where each agent refines or transforms the result in turn.
team_model_desc.route: A central agent acts as a message router, directing communication between agents without them talking directiy.
team_model_desc.coordinate: A network pattern is the structure that defines how agents connect, exchange information, and coordinate with each other.
team_model_desc.collaborate: Multiple agents work simultaneously on tasks, often sharing results to speed up processing.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Setting external services to enhance your workflow

branches.refresh_failed: Failed to refresh, please try again

tasks.rename_save_error: Failed to save, please try again
tasks.access_denied_description: You don't have permission to access this task. Please contact the task owner to invite you via the "Invite Members" feature.

retrievers.title: Retriever Management
retrievers.description: Manage retrieval and storage engine configurations for RAG
retrievers.no_retrievers_hint: Click the button below to create your first retriever
retrievers.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete the retriever "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
retrievers.retriever_id_hint: Unique identifier, can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
retrievers.retriever_id_readonly: Retriever ID cannot be changed after creation
retrievers.index_strategy_per_user_desc: Each user uses an independent index, suitable for multi-tenant isolation
retrievers.index_strategy_per_dataset_desc: Each dataset uses an independent index, suitable for large-scale data
retrievers.index_strategy_fixed_desc: All data uses the same index
retrievers.index_strategy_rolling_desc: Automatically create multiple indices based on dataset ID range
retrievers.fixed_index_name_empty: Fixed index name cannot be empty
retrievers.rolling_step_hint: Dataset ID range per index (e.g., 5000 means 0-4999, 5000-9999...)
retrievers.rolling_step_invalid: Rolling step must be a positive integer
retrievers.rolling_prefix_required: Rolling index mode requires index prefix
retrievers.per_dataset_prefix_required: Per dataset sharding mode requires index prefix
retrievers.name_invalid_hint: Can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
retrievers.group_required_message: You must select a target group when creating a retriever in group mode
retrievers.retrieval_methods_hint: Select which retrieval methods to enable for this retriever. At least one method must be enabled.

notifications.enable_description: Get notified when tasks are completed or failed
notifications.permission_denied: Notification permission denied. Please enable it in browser settings.
notifications.not_supported: Browser notifications are not supported in this browser.

send_key.title: Message Send Shortcut
send_key.description: Choose which keyboard shortcut sends messages in the chat
send_key.option_enter: Enter to send (Shift+Enter for new line)
send_key.option_cmd_enter: Cmd/Ctrl+Enter to send (Enter for new line)
send_key.save_failed: Failed to save send key preference

search_key.title: Search Shortcut Key
search_key.description: Choose keyboard shortcut to open search dialog
search_key.save_failed: Failed to save search shortcut key

memory.title: Long-term Memory
memory.description: Enable AI to remember context from your previous conversations across different tasks

guide.title: Welcome
guide.description: Before you can start using the app, please complete the setup below first!

onboarding.step1_description: Code mode lets the AI dev team build features, fix bugs, and explore codebases. Wiki mode is for viewing code knowledge base. Click 'New Conversation' to start a new Chat anytime.
onboarding.step2_description: Click these cards to quickly switch between different agents. Different agents can help you complete specific tasks faster.
onboarding.step3_description: Type your task or question here for the AI team to work on.
onboarding.step4_description: Here you can upload attachments, select chat bots, and change AI models.
onboarding.step4_description_no_team: You haven't created any teams yet. Please create your first AI team in Settings.
onboarding.step5_description: Click the send button to submit your task to the AI team for execution.
onboarding.step6_description: View all your previous tasks here. Click any task to see details and conversation history.
onboarding.step7_description: Create and manage AI teams, configure bots, and set up Git integrations in Settings.

dialog.confirm_close_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?

quota.detail_monthly: Your monthly quota is {{monthly_quota}}, used {{monthly_usage}}, left {{monthly_left}}.
quota.detail_tip: Monthly quota resets at the beginning of each month, permanent quota can be obtained via activities.

error.required: Please fill in all required fields
error.invalid_domain: Please enter a valid domain (e.g. gitlab.example.com or http://gitlab.internal.com)

github.title: How to get your GitHub token:
github.step3: 3. Select appropriate scopes and copy the generated token

gitea.title: How to get your Gitea token:
gitea.step3: 3. Select appropriate scopes and copy the generated token
gitea.step4: ⚠️ Note: Token must have 'user' permission enabled (for fetching user info)

gitlab.title: How to get your GitLab token:
gitlab.step3: 3. Select appropriate scopes and copy the generated token

gerrit.title: How to get Gerrit HTTP password:
gerrit.step2: 2. Generate a new HTTP password under "HTTP Credentials"
gerrit.step3: 3. Copy the username and password, and paste them here

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Manage Claude Code Skills to extend your bot capabilities
skills.no_skills_description: Upload a Claude Code Skill ZIP package to get started
skills.manage_skills_description: Upload, edit, or delete Claude Code Skills to extend your bot capabilities
skills.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete the skill "{{skillName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
skills.delete_note: Note: If this skill is referenced by any Ghost, the deletion will fail. Please remove the skill from all Ghosts first.
skills.upload_modal_description: Upload a Claude Code Skill ZIP package containing SKILL.md
skills.update_modal_description: Upload a new ZIP package to update this skill
skills.skill_name_hint: Unique identifier for this skill (lowercase, hyphens allowed)
skills.drop_file_here: Drop ZIP file here or click to browse
skills.requirement_zip: ZIP file must contain a skill folder as root directory
skills.requirement_folder_name: Skill folder name must match ZIP file name
skills.requirement_description: SKILL.md must have YAML frontmatter with description field
skills.error_file_format: File must be a ZIP package (.zip)
skills.author: Author
skills.no_skills_available: No skills available. Upload skills in the Skills tab.
skills.no_skills_hint: Upload a skill ZIP package or use system skills
skills.preload_skills_description: Preloaded skills will be automatically injected into the system prompt
skills.preload_only_public_hint: Note: Only public skills can be preloaded
skills.overwrite_confirm_message: A skill named "{{name}}" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it with the new version?
skills.cannot_delete_description: Skill "{{skillName}}" is being used by the following Ghosts and cannot be deleted directly.
skills.reference_conflict_help: You can click "Remove Reference" to remove the reference from a single Ghost, or click the button below to remove all references and delete the skill at once.
skills.references_removed_success: Successfully removed all references and deleted the skill

models.rerank_top_n_hint: Number of top results to return
models.context_window_hint: Maximum context window size in tokens. Used for message compression.
models.max_output_tokens_hint: Maximum output tokens the model can generate per response.

models.fetch_error_unsupported: This provider does not support auto-loading model list

errors.custom_headers_values_must_be_strings: All header values must be strings

shells.validation_async_hint: Validation is running in the background. Results will be available shortly.

errors.image_not_compatible: Image is not compatible with the selected shell type

shells.software_requirements_hint: The following software must be pre-installed in your base image and meet minimum version requirements

inAppBrowser.title: Open in Default Browser
inAppBrowser.detectedApp: Detected that you are opening in {{app}}
inAppBrowser.detectedGeneric: Detected that you are opening in an in-app browser
inAppBrowser.whyDescription: In-app browsers may restrict login functionality from working properly. For the best experience, we recommend opening in your default browser (Safari, Chrome, etc.).
inAppBrowser.howToOpen: How to open in default browser?

wechat: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
dingtalk: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
alipay: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
qq: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
weibo: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
facebook: Tap the menu button in the top right corner
instagram: Tap the '···' menu in the top right corner
twitter: Tap the 'Share' button in the top right corner
default: Tap the menu button in the top right corner
Select 'Open in Browser' or 'Open in Default Browser'

inAppBrowser.urlCopied: Link copied! You can paste and open it in your default browser.
inAppBrowser.copyFailed: Failed to copy. Please manually copy the URL from the address bar.
inAppBrowser.footerNote: Opening in default browser ensures all features work properly

quick_access.switch_to_code_message: This agent is recommended for Code mode. Would you like to switch?
quick_access.switch_to_chat_message: This agent is recommended for Chat mode. Would you like to switch?
